titleNullable: Bulgarian Facebook Pages for Fake News Detection
subtitleNullable: Titles of facebook posts from different bulgarian facebook news pages.
descriptionNullable:
The dataset contains post titles from various public Facebook news pages gathered in the first few weeks of January 2021. All of the data is scrapped for academic purposes.
The raw post title is shown in the first column and the following 16 columns contain additional information obtained as a result of data processing.
Read the description under the column names for further information about the content of the column.

___________________________________________
The data is used in:
T. Mladenova and I. Valova, "Analysis of the KNN Classifier Distance Metrics for Bulgarian Fake News Detection," 2021 3rd International Congress on Human-Computer Interaction, Optimization and Robotic Applications (HORA), 2021, pp. 1-4, doi: 10.1109/HORA52670.2021.9461333.
